test_vote
=========

.. py:module:: test_vote


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   test_vote.setup_test_activities
   test_vote.test_get_activity_ranking
   test_vote.test_vote_for_activities
   test_vote.test_vote_with_duplicate_activity
   test_vote.test_vote_with_invalid_score


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: setup_test_activities()

   Set up test activities before each test.


.. py:function:: test_get_activity_ranking()

   Test getting activities ranked by average score.


.. py:function:: test_vote_for_activities()

   Test voting for activities with scores.


.. py:function:: test_vote_with_duplicate_activity()

   Test that voting for same activity twice is rejected.


.. py:function:: test_vote_with_invalid_score()

   Test that invalid scores (outside 1-10) are rejected.
